entry.title: Blinded 2-party Musig2
entry.summary: The email discusses a method to solve blinding. The signing process involves generating values for X, K1, K2, R, e, e', and s using specific calculations. The verification process involves checking the values of Rv and ev against their expected values. The author is seeking a review of their solution and asks for feedback. They provide a link to a GitHub gist for reference.
